metadata.description: Enhanced decision-support dataset with structured data requirements for matching Canadian SMEs to AI funding programs

changelog.2.0: Added data_requirements section with mandatory/optional fields, documents, validation rules, and collection guidance
changelog.1.0: Initial release with basic program information and qualification logic

universal_fields.description: Fields that are commonly used across multiple programs

business_structure.help_text: Select the legal structure that best describes your organization

employee_count.question_text: How many full-time equivalent (FTE) employees does your organization have?
employee_count.help_text: Include all full-time, part-time (converted to FTE), and contract employees. Include affiliated companies if applicable.

annual_revenue.question_text: What was your annual revenue in the most recent fiscal year (CAD)?
annual_revenue.help_text: Enter 0 if pre-revenue. Use your most recent completed fiscal year.

years_in_operation.question_text: How many years has your organization been operating?
years_in_operation.help_text: Count from date of incorporation or business registration

region.question_text: Where is your business primarily located?
region.help_text: Select the province or territory where your main operations are based

canadian_operations.question_text: Do you have physical operations and employees based in Canada?
canadian_operations.help_text: You must have actual Canadian presence (not just incorporation)

display_values.early_stage_rd: Early-stage R&D (developing new AI technology, TRL 1-6)
display_values.commercializing_ai: Commercializing AI technology (TRL 7-9, ready for market)
display_values.adopting_ai: Adopting existing AI solutions to transform operations
display_values.compute_resources: Accessing AI compute resources for training/deployment
display_values.generative_ai_deep_learning: Developing generative AI or deep learning solutions

project_type.question_text: What type of AI project are you pursuing?
project_type.help_text: Choose the option that best describes your primary AI initiative

project_cost_estimate.question_text: What is your estimated total project cost (CAD)?
project_cost_estimate.help_text: Include all costs: salaries, software, hardware, consulting, training, etc.

funding_secured_percentage.question_text: What percentage of project funding have you already secured from non-government sources?
funding_secured_percentage.help_text: Include your own cash, investor commitments, bank financing, etc. Do not include government grants.

project_started.question_text: Have you already started incurring expenses for this project?
project_started.help_text: Some programs require application before project start

mandatory.question_text: What is the legal name of your organization?
mandatory.help_text: As shown on certificate of incorporation

mandatory.question_text: What is your CRA Business/GST number?

optional.question_text: What year was your company founded?
Which sector best describes your project?

optional.question_text: Is your organization majority-owned or led by any of the following groups?
optional.help_text: Select all that apply. This information helps with program priority assessment.

Most recent 6-month interim financial statements
Bank statements, letters of intent from investors, credit facility letters, signed agreements, or term sheets proving 50%+ non-government funding secured
Comprehensive business overview with AI strategy and commercialization plan

documents.description: Financial projections for project duration (up to 3 years)
For commercialization projects (Pillar 1): technical details of AI solution, TRL level, and commercialization strategy

Amount you must secure from non-government sources (minimum 50%)
Dollar amount of funding you've confirmed

mandatory.help_text: IRAP is only for for-profit incorporated companies
Must be incorporated in Canada with R&D activities in Canada
Must involve technical uncertainty and innovation - not just implementation of existing solutions

mandatory.question_text: Does your project involve technical uncertainty that cannot be solved with existing knowledge?
mandatory.help_text: IRAP requires genuine innovation - not just implementing known solutions. You must be developing something new or significantly improved.

mandatory.question_text: Does your project have clear commercialization potential within 2-3 years?
mandatory.help_text: IRAP requires a path to market and revenue generation
Must apply before starting project. No retroactive funding.

optional.question_text: Do you have technical staff (beyond founders) working on R&D?
optional.help_text: Strongly preferred but not absolute requirement for very early startups. IRAP can fund hiring technical staff.

optional.question_text: Do you have customers, pilots, or letters of intent?
optional.help_text: Shows market validation and strengthens application

Credentials and experience of leadership team
Qualifications of technical staff working on R&D
Detailed technical overview of what you're developing, technical challenges, approach

programs.name: Scientific Research & Experimental Development Tax Credit (SR&ED)

mandatory.help_text: Must file Canadian corporate tax return
R&D work must be performed in Canada
Must involve experimental development or applied research - not adoption

mandatory.question_text: Did your project involve technical uncertainty that couldn't be solved using standard practices?
mandatory.help_text: Must demonstrate uncertainty beyond current industry knowledge

mandatory.question_text: Did you follow a systematic approach with hypothesis, testing, and iteration?
mandatory.help_text: Must show structured experimentation, not just trial and error

mandatory.question_text: Did your work result in new knowledge or significant improvement in AI capabilities?
mandatory.help_text: Must achieve or attempt to achieve technological advancement

optional.help_text: No size restrictions - all companies eligible. Affects credit rate (35% for small CCPCs, 15% for others).
Affects eligibility for enhanced 35% refundable rate (CCPCs with income <$500K)

optional.question_text: What is your fiscal year-end date?
optional.help_text: Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Determines claim deadline (18 months after year-end)

optional.question_text: What were your estimated eligible R&D expenses in the fiscal year?
optional.help_text: Include R&D salaries, contractors, materials. Used to estimate credit amount.

documents.description: Lab notebooks, code repositories, design documents, test results, records of experiments
Time tracking showing R&D vs non-R&D work
Payroll records for R&D employees
Invoices for contractor/consultant R&D work

calculated_fields.description: Estimated total recovery including provincial credits (40-60% typical)

collection_guidance.notes: SR&ED is retroactive - claim after work is done. Main qualification is whether project meets 3 SR&ED criteria. Recommend SR&ED consultant for optimization.

mandatory.help_text: DMAP is Ontario-only
DMAP is specifically for planning phase, not implementation
DMAP covers 50% up to $15K, so max $30K total consultant cost

optional.question_text: Have you identified a qualified Digital Adoption Consultant?
optional.help_text: Must work with approved consultant from OCI network

display_values.identify_ai_use_cases: Identifying AI use cases for my business

optional.question_text: What do you need help with? (Select all that apply)
optional.help_text: DMAP covers comprehensive digital modernization planning

documents.description: Initial interest form submission
Quote from approved Digital Adoption Consultant

calculated_fields.description: Amount you must pay (50% of consultant cost)

collection_guidance.notes: Perfect first step for Ontario SMEs unsure about AI strategy. Leads to TDP implementation funding up to $150K.

mandatory.help_text: AI Assist is specifically for Generative AI and Deep Learning projects

display_values.generative_ai: Generative AI (text, image, code generation, etc.)

mandatory.question_text: Are you developing or integrating Generative AI or Deep Learning?

mandatory.help_text: Must be actively incorporating into products/services, not just using ChatGPT API

collection_guidance.notes: AI Assist provides advisory services ($500 cost to SME). Can be combined with regular IRAP R&D funding. Call 1-877-994-4727 and mention AI Assist.

mandatory.help_text: Must meet BDC standard lending criteria

mandatory.question_text: How would you describe your credit situation?
mandatory.help_text: This is a loan requiring credit evaluation. Be honest - BDC will assess.
BDC Data to AI is for implementing/adopting AI, not developing new AI tech

optional.help_text: BDC can finance up to 100% of project costs
No specific limit but primarily targets SMEs
Longer operating history improves credit assessment

documents.description: Company financials for credit assessment
Recent corporate tax returns
For owners/guarantors
BDC creates this with you during advisory phase
documents.notes: BDC develops this during advisory engagement

calculated_fields.description: BDC can finance up to 100% of project costs

collection_guidance.notes: No formal application - call 1-877-232-2269. BDC does needs assessment, creates roadmap, then finances implementation. Timeline: 2-3 months total.

programs.name: Nova Scotia Productivity and Innovation Voucher

mandatory.help_text: Registered business in good standing
PIV is Nova Scotia only

display_values.not_yet_identified: Not yet identified (need help finding partner)

mandatory.question_text: Have you identified a Nova Scotia university or college partner?
mandatory.help_text: Must collaborate with eligible NS post-secondary institution

mandatory.question_text: Have you received a Tier 1 voucher previously?
mandatory.help_text: Determines if you're eligible for Tier 2 ($25K) or Tier 1 ($15K)

optional.question_text: What technical challenge are you trying to solve?
optional.help_text: Should demonstrate clear business problem that university expertise can address

optional.question_text: Have you identified a professor or researcher to partner with?
optional.help_text: Can apply without partner identified, but strengthens application

documents.description: Completed online application (all questions mandatory)
Completed and signed by university/college partner
Company details and project information

collection_guidance.notes: Application window: May 7 - June 4, 2025 ONLY. Must complete project by March 16, 2026. Zero cost to business - entirely free R&D services.

mandatory.question_text: Have you formed a consortium of 3-4 organizations?
mandatory.help_text: Scale AI requires consortium model with at least one SME partner

mandatory.question_text: Does your consortium include at least one SME (under 500 employees)?
mandatory.help_text: At least one consortium member must be SME
Scale AI targets $1.5M-$8M projects

mandatory.question_text: Does your AI project address supply chain challenges?
mandatory.help_text: Must focus on retail, manufacturing, logistics, healthcare, infrastructure supply chains

mandatory.question_text: Will your project create new intellectual property?
mandatory.help_text: Must generate new foreground IP - not just adoption

mandatory.question_text: Are you willing to become a Scale AI member?
mandatory.help_text: Membership fees not due until after project approval

optional.question_text: Which sector does your project fall under?

calculated_fields.description: Scale AI typically funds 40-50% of project costs
